property.name: conditionErrorMessage
property.value:
Заданный в документе типовой маршрут согласования не может быть запущен (не соответствует условиям доступности).
Документ будет отправлен по заданному маршруту с пометкой "нетиповой".

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/eds-documents-repo/workflow/scripts/eds-auto-approval.js">
var msg = 'Документ ' + documentScript.wrapperDocumentLink(stm_document, '{lecm-document:ext-present-string}') + ' был автоматически отправлен на доработку в связи с превышением срока согласования';
AutoApprovalScript.doAuto(stm_document, 'REJECTED_AUTO', msg, 'REJECTED_AUTO');

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/eds-documents-repo/workflow/scripts/eds-auto-approval.js">
var msg = 'Документ ' + documentScript.wrapperDocumentLink(stm_document, '{lecm-document:ext-present-string}') + ' автоматически согласован в связи с превышением срока согласования';
AutoApprovalScript.doAuto(stm_document, 'APPROVED_AUTO', msg, 'APPROVAL_AUTO');

property.name: transitionExpression
property.value: @approvalRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef).contains("APPROVED") AND (!@routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() OR doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper") OR (@signingRoutesService.getWorkingFolder(doc.nodeRef) == null or (@signingRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef) != "NEW" AND @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef) == null )) OR (@signingRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef) == "NEW" AND !(@signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef) AND (@signingRoutesService.hasEmployeesInRoute(doc.nodeRef) AND !@signingRoutesService.hasUnresolvedMacros(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole(doc.nodeRef, "LECM_ES_SIGNERS"))))) or ((@signingRoutesService.getHistoryIterationsCount(doc.nodeRef) > 0 or "COMPLETE" == doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signingState") or @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)!=null) and !(@signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef, @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole("LECM_ES_SIGNERS", @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)))))))

property.name: transitionExpression
property.value: @routesGlobalSettingService.isAutoRoutingAfterApproval() AND !doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signed-on-paper") AND @routesService.getApprovalState(doc.nodeRef).contains("APPROVED") AND ((@signingRoutesService.getState(doc.nodeRef) == "NEW" AND @signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef) AND (@signingRoutesService.hasEmployeesInRoute(doc.nodeRef) AND !@signingRoutesService.hasUnresolvedMacros(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole(doc.nodeRef, "LECM_ES_SIGNERS")))) or ((@signingRoutesService.getHistoryIterationsCount(doc.nodeRef) > 0 or "COMPLETE" == doc.attr("lecm-signing-v2-aspects:signingState") or @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)!=null) and @signingRoutesService.isRouteAllowedForEmployeeFromAssoc(doc.nodeRef, @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef)) AND (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")!=true or (doc.assocAttr("lecm-additional-document:additionalDocumentType", "lecm-doc-dic-dt:es-sign-required")==true and @signingRoutesService.isAllEmployeesInRouteHasBusinessRole("LECM_ES_SIGNERS", @signingRoutesService.getLastIteration(doc.nodeRef))))))

scriptLabel
property.value: Раздача прав на договор участникам согласования
